name: Mekong At A Glimpse
description:
This is the best way to explore the truly beauty of Mekong, it is not touristy in comparison with all of the tours to the Delta that you have ever joined before.

You can not only touch the purity of the nature here but also interacting with the hospitable and friendly local people.

This is a great chance to experience some traditional careers of the locals, and try your hands in it while they still last.
